tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE AR_Content_Creation_Logs (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT NOT NULL,
  content_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  creation_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  status VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  notes TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE ar_content_logs (
    log_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    log_timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    user_id INT NOT NULL,
    content_id INT NOT NULL,
    action VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE ar_content_details (
    content_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    content_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    content_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    content_size INT NOT NULL,
    creation_date DATE NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE ar_content_logs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    content_id INT NOT NULL,
    user_id INT NOT NULL,
    action VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE ar_content_logs (
    log_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    content_id INT NOT NULL,
    creation_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    creator_id INT NOT NULL,
    log_details TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE developers (
    developer_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    developer_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    specialization VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    join_date DATE NOT NULL,
    email VARCHAR(255) UNIQUE
);

CREATE TABLE content_logs_history (
    log_event_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    log_id INT NOT NULL,
    previous_details TEXT,
    updated_details TEXT,
    event_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);
